identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

block.p: * Space.com, New York, a multimedia company focused on topics like space exploration, to the New York office of Mediasmith to handle its media planning and buying account for online and offline media, with billings estimated at $15 million to $20 million. Online media duties had been handled in-house; offline media duties had been handled by the Wolf Group New York, which continues to handle the creative assignment along with the Creative Resource Company, Toronto.

* Space.com, New York, a multimedia company focused on topics like space exploration, to the New York office of Mediasmith to handle its media planning and buying account for online and offline media, with billings estimated at $15 million to $20 million. Online media duties had been handled in-house; offline media duties had been handled by the Wolf Group New York, which continues to handle the creative assignment along with the Creative Resource Company, Toronto.

* Hops, Tampa, Fla., a chain of microbrewery restaurants that is part of Avado Brands, to Austin Kelley Advertising, Atlanta, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, to handle its account, which had been handled in-house and on a project basis. Billings were estimated at more than $5 million. * PhotoPoint Corp., San Francisco, an online digital photography company, to the San Francisco office of Beyond Interactive, part of the Grey Global Group, as its first interactive agency. Billings were estimated at $1 million to $2 million.
